lib/lb/2mb.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  *  @brief   2-max bound implemenation.
00003  *
00004  *  Implemenation of the 2-max bound (2MB) used as a lower bound for the 
00005  *  Bottleneck TSP objective value.
00006  *
00007  *  @author  John LaRusic
00008  *  @ingroup lib
00009  ****************************************************************************/
00010 #include "common.h"
00011 #include "lb.h"
00012 
00013 /****************************************************************************
00014  * Public function implementations
00015  ****************************************************************************/
00016 int
00017 arrow_2mb_solve(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_bound_result *result)
00018 {
00019     /*
00020         Some explanation here: 
00021         - for symmetric problems we keep track of the smallest (alpha) and
00022           second smallest (beta) cost incident on each vertex and take the
00023           largest of all those values.  
00024         - for asymmetric problems we keep track of the smallest in-cost
00025           (alpha) and smallest out-cost (beta) incident on each vertex and
00026           take the largest of all those values.
00027     */
00028     int i, j, cost, alpha, beta;
00029     int max = INT_MIN;
00030     double start_time, end_time;
00031     
00032     start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00033     
00034     for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00035     {
00036         alpha = INT_MAX;
00037         beta = INT_MAX;
00038         
00039         for(j = 0; j < problem->size; j++)
00040         {
00041             if(i != j)
00042             {
00043                 if(problem->symmetric)
00044                 {
00045                     cost = problem->get_cost(problem, i, j);
00046                     if(cost < alpha)
00047                     {
00048                         beta = alpha;
00049                         alpha = cost;
00050                     }
00051                     else if(cost < beta)
00052                     {
00053                         beta = cost;
00054                     }
00055                 }
00056                 else
00057                 {
00058                     cost = problem->get_cost(problem, i, j);
00059                     if(cost < alpha) alpha = cost;
00060                 
00061                     cost = problem->get_cost(problem, j, i);
00062                     if(cost < beta) beta = cost;
00063                     
00064                 }
00065             }
00066         }
00067         
00068         if(problem->symmetric)
00069         {
00070             if(max < beta) max = beta;
00071         }
00072         else
00073         {
00074             if(max < alpha) max = alpha;
00075             if(max < beta) max = beta;
00076         }
00077     }
00078     end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00079     
00080     result->obj_value = max;
00081     result->total_time = end_time - start_time;
00082     return ARROW_SUCCESS;   
00083 }
